songs.title: The Perfect Date
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Bounce

[Verse 1]
Last night, you had the pink bike
Riding around, face bright, sunshine
I feel a bit tough, excitement
Care too much but don't feel like trying
What else should I be trying?
Should I tell her that I'm caring, rap about six flaws or maybe seven
Scary hiding from my problems
You not a problem but if you are we can solve it together
Write a few letters
Make a state together, don't change like the weather
Leave for good, or worse 'cause right now
Of course you're the store's favorite
Don't change at all just here me saying
Words that sound cheesy
Everyday at Mcy D's with a burger or cheesy fries to match
Supersize, any size, you a prize in my eyes
That's right

[Chorus]
How about some fries and cartoons tonight?
As long as I'm with you, I'ma be alright
I ain't tryna sound horny but please just adore me
Write our own love story and tell it to my shawtie

[Interlude]
Sounds right
I know it sounds right

[Refrain]
Your love, my love, sky love, high love
Make a blade say high love
Let's go and touch the sky love
But I would- your boobs so tough
Trigger max, so rough
It's all good with me love
But I would
Your love, my love, sky love, high love
Make a blade say high love
Let's go and touch the sky love
But I would- your boobs so tough
Trigger max, so rough
It's all good with me love
But I would

[Bridge]
But I would
But I would
But I would
But, but I would

[Chorus]
How about some fries and cartoons tonight?
As long as I'm with you, I'll be alright
I ain't tryna sound corny, I'll be alright
But please just call me
How about some fries and cartoons tonight?
As long as I'm with you, I'ma be alright
I ain't tryna sound horny but please just adore me
Write our own love story and tell it to my shawtie

[Outro]
I would
